# button-component

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                    | Type                                                            | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ---------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`   | If true, the component will be disabled.       | `boolean`                                                       | `false`     |
| `leftIcon`  | `left-icon`  | If true, the default left icon will be shown.  | `boolean`                                                       | `false`     |
| `rightIcon` | `right-icon` | If true, the default right icon will be shown. | `boolean`                                                       | `false`     |
| `size`      | `size`       | The size of the component.                     | `"base" \| "md" \| "sm"`                                        | `'base'`    |
| `type`      | `type`       | The type of the component                      | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`                               | `'button'`  |
| `variant`   | `variant`    | The variant of the component.                  | `"ghost" \| "outline" \| "solid"`                               | `'solid'`   |
| `visual`    | `visual`     | The visual color appearance of the component.  | `"error" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'primary'` |
